00238     struct Tag {
00239         Tag(const char* t = 0, bool ind = true)
00240                 : tagName(t), hasChildren(false), lastChildIsText(false),
00241                 openingTagClosed(false), indentInside(ind) {}

00253     // Try to use it as much as possible, especially with constants.

00256     // TODO check return value!!!
00257     inline void writeCString(const char* cstr) {
00258         device()->write(cstr, qstrlen(cstr));
00259     }
00260     inline void writeChar(char c) {
00261         device()->putChar(c);
00262     }
00263     inline void closeStartElement(Tag& tag) {
00264         if (!tag.openingTagClosed) {
00265             tag.openingTagClosed = true;
00266             writeChar('>');
00267         }
00268     }
